changelog:
Syberia OS updated!

Current build date: 10/20/2018
Minimum firmware required: 8.9.20 or 8.4.19 (depends from your battery type)
Minimum TWRP required: 3.2.3(latest wight554) or OrangeFox R8.1

Changelog:
Updated translations
Add Rosy Brown accent
Improved Messaging app
Kernel: linux-3.18.124
Fixed manual sim provision
Fix Settings FC's on Syberia theme
Kang media codec files from Marlin
Update ims APKs from treble vendor
Add new feature of One-hand UI Mode
Animate switching keyguard indications
Remove fake unlimited google photo shit
Add ims APN for megafon and mts carriers
Fix BT pairing dialog DarkUI theme issue
Update NFC tile and add statusbar NFC icon
Remove Substratum dependency from Theme tile
Add OmniJaws (weather on lockscreen and tile)
HALs: Merge tag 'LA.UM.7.6.2.r1-03600-89xx.0'
Add LineageOS dictionaries and enable gesture input
Allow to suppress notifications sound/vibration if screen is On

Download:  check OTA or direct https://sourceforge.net/projects/syberiaos/files/chiron/syberia_chiron-v1.2-20181020-1314-OFFICIAL.zip/download

#syberia #chiron #donate
